author: ChaseCares
name: broadcastboxlive
short: Simple Broadcast Box live stream notifier
description: A simple cog to post currently live streams from https://b.siobud.com.
install_msg:
Thanks for checking out BroadcastBoxLive!
If you have any trouble, open an issue [here](https://github.com/ChaseCares/RedBotCogs/issues). To get started load the cog and run `[p]help bbl`.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store end user data.
